      • getLuceneModules

        public static java.util.List<LucModule<?>> getLuceneModules()
        Returns list of required lucene modules for help. Groups by module instance and language to separate search areas and indexes.
        Returns:
        list of lucene modules for help

      • getHelpItems

        public static java.util.List<HelpTopicHelper> getHelpItems(Site site,
                                                           java.lang.String moduleInstance,
                                                           java.util.EnumSet<LangSupport> langs,
                                                           boolean exclude)
                                                    throws DgException
        Returns list of HelpTopicHelper beans for specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        siteId - can be null in which case it will not filter by siteId.
        moduleInstance - can be null in which case it will not filter by module instances
        langs - can be null in which case it will not filter by languages of help topic body
        exclude - can be null which means false. If true language match is inverted.
        Returns:
        list of help topic helpers HelpTopicHelper
        Throws:
        DgException
